评论详情: This took a long time to arrive but looks just like photo. Just right for a cold day when inside if you run on the warmer side.  It is not bulky and fits nicely under winter coat. Soft fabric. Sleeve buttons make it unique.
Relaxed fit & soft feeling. Very comfortable & fit to size.

This isn’t a bad shirt, i’ve worn a couple times and intend to keep it rotating in my closet however, I don’t feel like the pictures did a great job with accuracy. This is not a thick cozy sweater like it looks It is a very thin material. It also seems a lot shorter than what it looks in the picture both the sleeves and down at the waist. The sleeves are too short for me so I have to roll them up. I bought this because I had a baby not long ago and I was hoping for something a little bit looser around the midsection like it looks in the photos, but it’s really not that loose in the mid section and shows everything. Overall, this shirt is fine like I said I plan on wearing it again and probably would’ve rated it higher if it wasn’t for how misleading I feel the pictures are.

评论概述: They gave me a different sweater
评论详情: Ordered the item in December a week before Christmas ordered them in different colors didn’t receive the black one until the 31 and it was a different sweater than the one ordered there was no 3 button on the side of the sleeve and it was more of a sleeve with strings crossed like a net instead of an actual sleeve I like the sweater they gave and kept it as a new year gift only issue I had with it was it was see through under certain bright light so wear a tank top underneath the other sweaters I’ve received were the actual item, the fabric is more of a velvet kind of soft. I was expecting yarn type like wool. I love the colors the green and burgundy look great. they fit well and the three buttons are on the side of the sleeve. I do wish that the sleeve part closer to the hem on your hands was sown longer like the picture The buttons look more spaced in the picture where when received it looks closer and the hem smaller but otherwise it’s great.

评论概述: Comfy, cute, and a little thin

I love that I can dress these up or down depending on the situation while still looking and feeling cute. They're of decent quality with a nice fitting (I usually order a size up so clothes aren't too tight feeling for me, but my regular size would have looked cute as well if I preferred a more form fitting shirt!)
I absolutely love this sweater. The material is extremely soft and it is very flattering. Received lots of compliments on it. Very happy with this purchase!

评论概述: Comfortable & Stylish - Great for Fall or Thanksgiving!
评论详情: I’m 5'8" and 190 lbs, and I ordered it in an XL, which fits me well. I could have probably gone a size smaller, but I prefer my clothes a little loose, so I’m happy with the fit. The material is soft and cozy, perfect for cooler weather.  I bought it on sale and plan to wear it for Thanksgiving. However, I was a little surprised by the color. I expected it to be more of a tanish shade, but it’s actually more greenish in tone. It’s still a nice color, but just not what I was anticipating.  Pros: Soft, comfortable fabric that feels great to wear Relaxed fit with decorative buttons for a stylish touch Great value, especially when purchased on sale  Cons: Color is a bit different than expected (more greenish than tan) Could be a bit smaller for those who prefer a more fitted look  Overall, I’m happy with this purchase and look forward to wearing it for Thanksgiving. Would recommend it if you're looking for a comfortable, stylish top for the fall season!
True to size.  Fabric is very soft.  Nicely packaged so it is not wrinkled when it arrives.  Sleeves are nice and long.  Very comfy.  I love the shirts from this brand!
Exactly as pictured, material is warm but not super hot great quality and true to size!
Soft material, good length and true color.  Medium weight and stretchy.  Perfect with jeans.
Very soft and cozy definitely able to layer under this if need be.perfect for the fall.
Very soft, comfortable and fits well
I love this fit and feel. Liked it so much I bought it in another color. Fits true to size.

评论概述: More stylish than the average v-neck
评论详情: I think this sweater is nicer than similar lightweight v-neck sweaters thanks to the 3-button cuff styling. It gives a more finished, dressy look without interfering with the comfort level. I washed the sweater in cold water and hung it to dry, and there was no noticeable shrinkage I can't see any wrinkles. It's soft on my skin, and is not too clingy. It's all one length, not overly long (it won't cover your entire butt if you're wearing with leggings), but enough fabric to look nice if you like wearing your tops over your jeans. I'd describe the color as a light taupe. It's a neutral color and is accurately depicted in the photos, so will match with almost anything. Recommend!
Soft comfortable, and I like the wide rib pattern

This top is really cute. I’m 5’6” 170lbs and carry most of my weight in my tummy. This shirt is well stitched, and fits as I expected. The fabric is soft and survived the washing machine and the dryer. It’s a great price for a nice autumn blouse.
Sizing is off.  Material is cheap.

This is a great, semi-casual sweater. It is incredibly soft and comfortable! It is a little thin, which I don't mind at all. It gives the sweater an airy, lightweight feel. You could easily pair this sweater with a pair of jeans, a skirt or dress pants.  I am 5'4", 125 lbs, and the small fits me great.  Definitely recommend this sweater as a stylish, comfortable and versatile addition to your wardrobe.
I love the feel of the fabric, it fits and looks great!

The Dokotoo long-sleeved V-neck shirt is a cozy and stylish choice for cooler weather. Made from soft, comfortable fabric, it offers a relaxed fit that's perfect for everyday wear. The decorative buttons add a charming touch to the knitted pullover design, making it versatile enough for casual outings or lounging at home. This tunic top pairs effortlessly with leggings or jeans, making it ideal for spring, autumn, and winter. Easy to care for, wash in cold water and hang dry to maintain its quality and durability. It's quickly become a chic and comfortable wardrobe staple.

Perfect for fall weather. Incredibly soft and cozy, the sleeves are nice and long. The buttons are a nice touch, and V-neck gives it and cute look with jeans. I get overheated often so this shirt is perfect for me but I can definitely see how it wouldn't be warm enough for someone who gets cold easy. Overall, I really like this top and will probably wear it as much as possible this fall.

评论概述: I liked this more than I expected to
评论详情: I'm 5'9 and 155lbs. I usually get a Medium in tops. I got a Large because I felt that this sweater would work better on me slightly slouchy. I was not wrong, but I also think Medium would work as well for a different type of look. This sweater is ribbed and soft. I got the color Parchment instead of going for my usual black. I really enjoyed wearing it to the point that I did wind up ordering another color in Medium. I don't know that I'll have a preference either, because I still really liked how the Large looked and felt.

Nice long sleeve shirt. My wife ordered a size larger than she needed according to the sizing chart to allow her to use this as a layered piece comfortably. The material is soft and comfortable to wear. Not particularly warm but works beautifully for fall.
This shirt is soft, it fits well, but it is thin. Not sure how long it will last after a few washings. The style looks nice, especially with jeans.

评论用户: Hi this is Peg, I liked this shirt so much, I ordered again!
评论详情: Comfortable, pretty & a good value. Like the color, as well.  I will be buying another color in this sweater.

This shirt is very soft and comfortable. Easily dressed up for work or dressed down with a pair of jeans.  I was worried about the length of the sleeves and the fit of the arms but it surpassed my expectations.  Perfect for longer arms and for larger upper arms. It is true to size.

评论概述: Coziest shirt for transitioning to fall!

评论详情: Favorite color and it goes well with winter and fall

I absolutely love this long sleeved top! The first thing i noticed is how soft it is. It feels great against the skin, making it a comfortable to wear. I ordered a large in the Parchment color, and it’s true to the picture—exactly what I was hoping for.  At 6’ and 195 lbs, the fit is just right. It’s a versatile piece perfect for spring and fall. I initially thought it would be more of a sweater based on the photos, but after reading the description more, I realized it's more of a lightweight long sleeved shirt. I’m still glad I ordered it.  I've ordered several items from Dokotoo, and I have yet to be disappointed. The quality across the board has been excellent. Highly recommend this top!
The sweater is beautiful so far nothing to worry about..
Great soft and lightweight feel. Fits well.

This shirt is very soft and comfortable. It does run a little big so size down if you like a slimmer fit.  The sleeves are long and go past my wrist but they are not so long that it gets in the way. The buttons on the sleeve are a little too big and get caught on things sometimes. I am surprised I have not broken one yet. Yes, I am clumsy. The material is a little sheer so you probably want to wear a camisole under it. Overall, it's a nice shirt that is very comfortable and lightweight.

My sweater finally arrived. It is thin, as mentioned in some reviews, but I like that. It is very soft and cozy. Once I had it on, I didn’t want to take it off! Nice sale price for the value and pretty color.

I thought this was a great shirt at a nice price.  Wore it to work today and found a hole in the front and a coworker pointed out a hole in the back!  So sad I was loving Dokotoo and purchased several of their shirts.  Now I am reconsidering and plan to see if I can return, sad too cause I really liked the color and the fit.  I guess my lesson is to look stuff over right away and not trust a brand just because they look good.
